titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitation on the amount of business meal and entertainment expenses which are deductible.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14529-14530)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the reduction in the tax deductible portion of business meal and entertainment expenses.
